snippet.title: Tekken 6 to offer Penny Arcade skins, fight sticks
snippet.description: ...Are you a Tekken fan? Are you ready to drop some serious money on your favorite fighting game? Namco Bandai has just sent final details on the packages available with Tekken 6, and there is some impressive stuff going on here. Custom Penny-Arcade art? Oh yes. Arcade sticks? Those too. Let's take a look.First, you'll be able to buy the game for the regular $60 price, but if you want to s...

snippet.title: Team Fortress 2 gets Scout update, goes half price
snippet.description: ...Valve is continuing its support for Team Fortress 2, this time with an update focused on the Scout class. This includes new achievements, weapons, and even a few maps. snippet.title: Map making in Team Fortress 2 gets a little easier
snippet.description: ...While Valve may be busy at work supporting and developing the sequel for Left 4 Dead, that doesn't mean that it has forgotten about its other big multiplayer shooter, Team Fortress 2. The developer has announced an update to the Source SDK, which will make the process of creating new maps much...

snippet.title: Scouts, Xbox 360 getting love with Team Fortress 2 patch
snippet.description: ...Valve is continuing to support their lighthearted shooter Team Fortress 2, this time with an update intended to rebalance the Engineer and the Spy. Additionally, the developer has outlined its future plans, which include a new class update. The upcoming update includes the following changes...
